48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Hisham bin Hassan narrated from Al-Hasan :concerning the saying of Allah: O our Lord, give us good in this world, and good in the Hereafter. He said: “Knowledge and worship in this world, and Paradise in the Hereafter.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَقْدِ التَّسْبِيحِ بِالْيَدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Counting The Tasbih On The Hand
